statements: DELETE FROM financial_data WHERE transaction_id = 1001 AND transaction_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM financial_data WHERE account_number = 2005 AND amount > 5000.00;
DELETE FROM budget_forecasts WHERE year = 2022 AND quarter = 3;
DELETE FROM budget_forecasts WHERE year = 2023 AND quarter = 4;
DELETE FROM financial_data WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp' AND expenses > revenue;
DELETE FROM FinancialData WHERE year=2022 AND month=6;
DELETE FROM budgets WHERE budget_id = 100 AND year = 2022 AND total_budget = 50000.00;
DELETE FROM forecasts WHERE forecast_id = 50 AND forecast_date = '2023-01-15' AND expected_amount = 7500.00;
